ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_LancerBayonet_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Lancer bayonet "Knoxville"
ThingDef.description: A Confederate combat knife that can be used as a machete, bayonet for a lancer, or a toothpick.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_ConfBowie_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Combat bowie "Carolina"
ThingDef.description: Confederate bowie knife. The allrounder among the bowies of the Rimworld colonists.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_Shashka_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Shashka "Gogol"
ThingDef.description: A sharp steel saber, once used only by the Cossacks, and later by all the foot soldiers of the remnants of the destroyed tsar empire.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_Smaug_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Combat Knife "Smaug"
ThingDef.description: A heavy combat knife. Cheap, easy to make, but heavy.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_KukriL_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Combat kukri "Dundee"
ThingDef.description: A common steel kukri used by colonists as well as savages.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_KukriP_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Combat kukri "Tosh"
ThingDef.description: An expensive, Confederate combat kukri. The blade has a plasteel alloy that makes it so sharp that it can rival even the destructive power of chainswords. Preferably used by Confederate elite troops in close combat with Insectoids.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_Kultschwert_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Crusader sword "Jeanne"
ThingDef.description: Swords like this was used by the nuns of the Hel cult, a brutal and fanatical sect from the planet Hel. Swords of this type are extremely difficult to forge, but have incredibly sharp blades. It also includes a rite in which cult symbols are carved into the flayed skin of an enemy or martyr before it is wrapped around the sword hilt in a ceremonial act. The weapon smells strangely sweet and most people feel an instinctive discomfort when looking at the sword.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_Blade_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Tactical sword "Blade"
ThingDef.description: An very expensive, very sharp, and very deadly sword preferred by Confederate assassins.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_KultAxt_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Crusader axe "Verdun"
ThingDef.description: Axes like this was used by the nuns of the Hel cult, a brutal and fanatical sect from the planet Hel. The blade is exceptionally sharp and the heavy hammer dents even the thickest armor.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_Schmetterling_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Armblades "Schmetterling"
ThingDef.description: A feared and very rare weapon of the Hel cult, once used alongside Serpahim pistols by the Hel Nuns' stormtroopers. This blade is extremely sharp and are capable of penetrating even power armor. An ingenious mechanism allows it to be folded in with a simple movement and extended again with a menacing CHIK. Like all Hel weapons, the Schmetterling Blade are as advanced as it is evil.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_Butterfly_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Armblades "Butterfly"
ThingDef.description: It is no secret that the Confederation of Man looks with a certain fascination at the destroyed Hel cult. The Butterfly Armblade is another (primitive) attempt to copy a deadly weapon of the Hel nuns. While the original still has a morbid beauty and elegance, the Butterfly is a loud, ugly, brutal weapon that emits the acrid stench of chemfuel. The weapon can be folded and unfolded, which makes it more handy, but does not change the heavy weight of steel and screws. The COM prefers to equip its jump squads with the Butterfly. Together with the Gorgon SMG, the Butterfly and a lot of flak, the Confederate jumptroops do horrendous damage.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_RetroLancer_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona MK I Lancer "New Gettysburg"
ThingDef.description: The Gettysburg is the standard infantry rifle of the Confederacy of Man (CoM), a harsh regime on the fringes of the Glitterworlds battered by an ongoing war against the Insectoids. The sharp bayonet is effective in close combat.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_LCARdoppel_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona MK I Lancer "Quantrill"
ThingDef.description: The "Quantrill" is a modified version of the Gettysburg rifle. The fixture for attaching a bayonet has been removed and replaced with a powerful telescopic sight. The weapon is still used by guerrilla fighters today and was named after a particularly brutal bandit who was a great hero in the tales of the COM but a murderer and bandit for the rest of the galaxy and history.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_HAPdual_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona MK I Lancer "New Gettysburg" (SMG)
ThingDef.description: A modified version of the Gettysburg rifle to meet the needs of tank crews, pilots, as well as assault troops who require high firepower in a compact form. The weapon is difficult to control due to recoil, but enjoys great popularity among veterans.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_RetroLancerEM_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona MK I Lancer "New Gettysburg" (ext. mag.)
ThingDef.description: The Gettysburg is the standard infantry rifle of the Confederacy of Man (CoM), a harsh regime on the fringes of the Glitterworlds battered by an ongoing war against the Insectoids. The sharp bayonet is effective in close combat. This one has a extended mag.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_LancerMK2_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona MK II Lancer "Mar Sara"
ThingDef.description: The Mar Sara was named after a Rimworld that supposedly marked a turning point in the Confederacy of Man (CoM) ongoing war against the Insectoids. The Mar Sara shoots more accurately, has a larger magazine, and most importantly, an effective chainsaw bayonet. The weapon is popular among mercenaries, and although chain weapons are considered barbaric and inhumane on most Glitterworlds, Confederate weapons are still tolerated.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_LancerMK2ext_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona MK II Lancer "Mar Sara"(ext. mag.)
ThingDef.description: The Mar Sara was named after a Rimworld that supposedly marked a turning point in the Confederacy of Man (CoM) ongoing war against the Insectoids. The Mar Sara shoots more accurately, has a larger magazine, and most importantly, an effective chainsaw bayonet. The weapon is popular among mercenaries, and although chain weapons are considered barbaric and inhumane on most Glitterworlds, Confederate weapons are still tolerated.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_FireLancerMK2ext_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona MK II Lancer "Killgore"(ext. mag.)
ThingDef.description: The Killgore is a modification of the Lancer MK2, once developed by Confederate veterans on the bloody battlefields of the war against the Insectoids. What helps better than a chainsaw bayonet, heavy ammunition and large magazines? That's right, napalm. The fired ammunition is enriched by an improvised device with a napalm/chemfuel mixture, which immediately bursts into flames on contact. Calls for a ban on this weapon in the civilized Glitterworlds first arose when a Confederate unit used it against recalcitrant colonists. The weapon got its name from the quote of the commanding Lieutenant Colonel William "Bill" Killgore, who led the effort against the colonists and who was later hailed as a hero of the Confederacy of Man for his war crimes (or heroic deeds). He told a camera crew in front of the burning village and the smell of burning flesh in the air:/n"I love the smell of napalm in the morning."\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_PulseRifle_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M41A Pulse Rifle "Hicks"
ThingDef.description: The logical evolution of COM assault rifles, the expensive Pulse rifle fires caseless explosive ammunition capable of penetrating the thickest armor. Combined with the rifle's high accuracy and reliability, the "Hicks" is one of the most popular weapons in the Confederate military. Plans to fully equip the armed forces with the expensive weapon have been officially denied, citing the effectiveness of human waves and cheap weapons.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_PulseRifleShark_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M41B Pulse Rifle "Shark"
ThingDef.description: The logical evolution of COM assault rifles, the expensive Pulse rifle fires caseless explosive ammunition capable of penetrating the thickest armor. Combined with the rifle's high accuracy and reliability, the "Hicks" is one of the most popular weapons in the Confederate military. Plans to fully equip the armed forces with the expensive weapon have been officially denied, citing the effectiveness of human waves and cheap weapons. Of course, after the invention of a lot of confederated bug war veterans, the Hicks was upgraded with the good old chainsaw bayonet.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_COMDOOMHAR_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Heavy Assault Rifle "Slayer"
ThingDef.description: A further development of the Lancer rifle. Loaded with powerful .50 bullets and impressive accuracy, these expensive weapons were designed by the Confederation to be a real game changer in the war against the Insectoids.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_GoWGnasher_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Gnasher Shotgun "Hillbilly"
ThingDef.description: The Gnasher Shotgun is a popular weapon of the Confederate colonists, known for its ability to survive even in the most adverse conditions. The Gnasher is massive and penetrating, and its heavy barrel can easily crush an opponent's skull in close combat.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_GoWBurnGnasher_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Gnasher Shotgun "Dragonbreath"
ThingDef.description: The Gnasher Shotgun is a popular weapon of the Confederate colonists, known for its ability to survive even in the most adverse conditions. The Gnasher is massive and penetrating, and its heavy barrel can easily crush an opponent's skull in close combat.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Boltok_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Boltok revolver "Raynor"
ThingDef.description: The Raynor is a revolver of the Confederacy of Man (CoM), a harsh regime on the edge of the galaxy that has been fighting the Insectoids for decades. The weapon is powerful and widely used due to the Confederation's good relations with the galactic nobility.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_PyroBoltok_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Boltok revolver "Troublemaker"
ThingDef.description: An improvised, unstable device on the barrel of this Boltok revolver causes the cartridges to ignite when fired, setting the target on fire with a mixture of napalm and chemfuel. Very dangerous and unpredictable, this modification is used only by lunatics, idiots and pyromaniacs.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Boltokdoppel_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Boltok revolver "Redneck"
ThingDef.description: The Raynor is a revolver of the Confederacy of Man (CoM), a harsh regime on the edge of the galaxy that has been fighting the Insectoids for decades. The weapon is powerful and widely used due to the Confederation's good relations with the galactic nobility. The Redneck is a modified variant of the Boltok and is often called as the submachinegun for Cowboys and Hillbillys.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Gorgon_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Gorgon SMG "Reaper"
ThingDef.description: The Gorgon is a heavy SMG of the Confederacy of Man (CoM). Inaccurate, with a high rate of fire and a nevertheless high penetrating power, it is the standard weapon of the Confederate jump troops. Who needs an accurate firing weapon when you're pumped full of flake jumping into the middle of the Insectoid hordes?\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_WesSni_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Mac-101 "Daywalker"
ThingDef.description: According to scholars of the Glitterworlds, the Daywalker is a heavily modified version of the ancient Mac-11. The weapon has a high rate of fire, but modest accuracy.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Hammerburst_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Hammerburst Autoshotgun "Korhal"
ThingDef.description: Korhal was once a Confederate industrial world that was the first to fall victim to the ravenous swarm of Insectoids. Amidst the narrow streets and subway tunnels, the troops there held out for more than a year, pushing the Insectoids back piece by piece, especially with the hammerburst shotguns. Shotguns of this type are heavy, yet fully automatic, and their overpowering buckshot ammunition makes them capable of clearing entire housing complexes. The Confederate military leadership nevertheless decided to abandon Korhal and bombard it with nuclear weapons until the planet was covered only by dull shimmering glass. To this day, it is said that the defenders of Korhal would still be fighting in the narrow tunnels, waiting for reinforcements to arrive.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_BuStG_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Bullup-StG404 "Romanov"
ThingDef.description: Loosely based on an ancient assault rifle, the Romanov Rifle is prized galaxy-wide for its accuracy and firepower. It was the standard weapon of the Tsar's Guard before a bloody revolution overthrew the old order, turning the former nobles into homeless fugitives. After the destruction of the once powerful Tsar Guard, the black market was flooded with Romanov rifles.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_BuStGSD_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Bullup-StG404 "Romanov" (Okhrana)
ThingDef.description: Loosely based on an ancient assault rifle, the Romanov Rifle is prized galaxy-wide for its accuracy and firepower. It was the standard weapon of the Tsar's Guard before a bloody revolution overthrew the old order, turning the former nobles into homeless fugitives. After the destruction of the once powerful Tsar Guard, the black market was flooded with Romanov rifles./n/This model was used by the tsarist secret service and death squads and is more expensive to produce, but the scope makes it much more deadly.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Markza_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona GZ18 Markza "Wrangel"
ThingDef.description: A powerful carbine created to penetrate even the thickest armor. The gun shoots very accurately, but is very expensive to produce.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Wolfpistol_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona P3-TR0VNA pistol "Tatiana"
ThingDef.description: An accurate but expensive pistol with a high rate of fire. It is often used in assassinations and has a long and bloody history.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_MausingDoppel_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona P3-TR0VNA autopistol "Svetlana"
ThingDef.description: An accurate but expensive pistol with a high rate of fire. Modified into a submachine gun, this weapon was preferred by noblemen to shoot down rebellious peasants.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_HVK_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona HVK-30 "FAKK2"
ThingDef.description: The FAKK2 is a decommissioned Confederate assault rifle that has considerable firepower in addition to its high magazine capacity. The Confederacy particularly criticized the high ammunition consumption due to the indiscipline of the troops and discontinued the production of the weapon. Today, the weapon is used especially by the pirates, militant extremists and militias.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_HVKdual_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona HVK-30 "FAKK2" (jungle style)
ThingDef.description: The FAKK2 is a decommissioned Confederate assault rifle that has considerable firepower in addition to its high magazine capacity. The Confederacy particularly criticized the high ammunition consumption due to the indiscipline of the troops and discontinued the production of the weapon. Today, the weapon is used especially by the pirates, militant extremists and militias. This one has a jungle style magazine.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_HVKbig_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona HVK-30-C1 "Gorasnaya"
ThingDef.description: Before the swarm of Insectoids descended upon Confederation territory, the bugs had ravaged countless rimworlds, kingdoms large and small, states and colonies. One of these states was the UIR, the Union of Independent Republics. If the chroniclers of the Glitterworlds are to be believed, the UIR is the political descendant of a long-forgotten anti-royal uprising. In the midst of the Swarm Territory, the UIR continues to fight the Insectoids to this day, equipped with the weapons of the Confederacy. The decommissioned HVK-30 was delivered in large quantities to the UIR, heavily modified by the soldiers there, and is now the standard weapon of the Union forces. The HVK-30-C1 is heavy, clunky, and has a powerful ammunition canister capable of taking an entire area under fire. Sometimes weapons like this find their way to the unscathed Rimworlds or Glitterworlds and are valued and used there by mercenaries and veterans.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Argus_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Argus shotgun "Solomon"
ThingDef.description: The Solomon is a shotgun often used by pirates and gangsters due to its compact shape. The Argus shotgun is easy to build and lightweight, but has a short range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_LCAR_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona LCAR9 SMG "Snoop"
ThingDef.description: The Snoop is a Confederate decommissioned submachine gun that can be fired single- or double-handed. The Snoop has a reputation for not being very accurate, for jamming at the worst moments, and for being a weapon of Flakeheads and Scum in general.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_NeoPPSh_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona PPSh-82 "Vlassov"
ThingDef.description: A Tsar's Guard LMG loosely based on an antique submachine gun. The weapon has a high destructive power and can take a whole area under fire, but it is very unwieldy for an inexperienced shooter and the recoil should not be underestimated.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_NeoPPShSD_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona PPSh-82 "Vlassov" (Okhrana)
ThingDef.description: A Tsar's Guard LMG loosely based on an antique submachine gun. The weapon has a high destructive power and can take a whole area under fire, but it is very unwieldy for an inexperienced shooter and the recoil should not be underestimated. Among other things, this improved version was equipped with a silencer, which allows the Tsarist secret service and special forces to commit their murders undetected.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Mausing_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Mausing C101 "Nestor"
ThingDef.description: The Nestor is a heavy automatic pistol, used by tsarist cossacks and officers. In the course of time, the weapon has also found great use among anti-Tsarist and social revolutionary forces.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_KNfourtyfour_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona KN-44 "Mengsk"
ThingDef.description: An old, yet still very popular and common Confederate weapon. The Mengsk is reliable, easy to maintain and never jams. It is used galaxy-wide by terrorists, political extremists, militias, and pirates.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_KNfourtyfourDM_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona KN-44 "Mengsk" (jungle style)
ThingDef.description: An old, yet still very popular and common Confederate weapon. The Mengsk is reliable, easy to maintain and never jams. It is used galaxy-wide by terrorists, political extremists, militias, and pirates.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_HelBolter_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Heavy assault rifle "Vandire"
ThingDef.description: The HAR is a very rare and expensive weapon, very difficult to make and used by the nuns of one of the most brutal and murderous cults in the galaxy, the Hel cult. The Vandire is surprisingly light for its size and has a high magazine capacity.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_HelBolterdual_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Heavy assault rifle "Vandire" (ext. mag.)
ThingDef.description: The HAR is a very rare and expensive weapon, very difficult to make and used by the nuns of one of the most brutal and murderous cults in the galaxy, the Hel cult. The Vandire is surprisingly light for its size and has a high magazine capacity.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_HelMG_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Heavy Machine Gun "Inquisitor"
ThingDef.description: The Inquisitor is a super heavy and super expensive weapon once used by the elite guard of the long forgotten Hel cult. The heavy weapon rains down a storm of explosive bolts on its enemies, striking with deadly precision. The weapon is rare, expensive to manufacture and extremely popular with collectors.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_PyroHelBolter_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Heavy assault rifle "Absolution"
ThingDef.description: The Absolution is a modified HAR with a canister containing a flammable mixture of chemfuel and napalm attached to the barrel. If the victim does not die from the severe injuries caused by the explosive rounds, he is set on fire. Effective, simple and yet elegant.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_PyroHelBolterdual_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Heavy assault rifle "Absolution" (ext. mag.)
ThingDef.description: The Absolution is a modified HAR with a canister containing a flammable mixture of chemfuel and napalm attached to the barrel. If the victim does not die from the severe injuries caused by the explosive rounds, he is set on fire. Effective, simple and yet elegant.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_HelComBolter_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Heavy commando rifle "Vandire"
ThingDef.description: A heavy, silenced battle rifle. The magazine has been reduced in size to allow the scope and silencer to be fitted.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_COMBolter_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Heavy assault rifle "Duke"
ThingDef.description: The Duke is an attempt to make the expensive Hel HAR available to Confederate forces through mass production. For this, the silencer was removed, the magazine was slightly shortened, the components are chunkier and the weapon is heavier. Oh yes, and the elegance has also disappeared. Still expensive, but with powerful penetrating power, the Duke is successfully used by Confederate forces in the fight against the Insectoids.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_PyroCOMBolter_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Heavy assault rifle "Smoker"
ThingDef.description: Like the Duke, the Smoker is an attempt to mimic the fabled Hel assault rifles, but this time using a crude, improvised system of napalm and chemfuel to ignite the explosive rounds as they exit the barrel. The weapon, compared to the original, is primitive, ugly, clumsy and heavy, but still extremely effective. A popular weapon among pyromaniacs and people who want to play it safe.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_COMBolterdual_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Heavy assault rifle "Duke" (ext. Mag)
ThingDef.description: The Duke is an attempt to make the expensive Hel HAR available to Confederate forces through mass production. For this, the silencer was removed, the magazine was slightly shortened, the components are chunkier and the weapon is heavier. Oh yes, and the elegance has also disappeared. Still expensive, but with powerful penetrating power, the Duke is successfully used by Confederate forces in the fight against the Insectoids. This one has a extended magazine.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Slugger_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Stormpistol "Slugger"
ThingDef.description: Another copy of the Confederation of Man, the Slugger is based on the ancient blueprints of the P87 assault pistol and has actually been improved in every way; at the cost of slightly less penetrating power. The weapon is more accurate, shoots faster, has a larger magazine and the recoil has been massively reduced by a compressed air suspension. Overheats quickly.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_HAP_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Heavy Assault Pistol "Seraphim"
ThingDef.description: The Seraphim is an expensive, but very accurate heavy pistol, which was used by the jump packed assault troopers of the Hel cult.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_WolfSTG_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Assault rifle "Frateris"
ThingDef.description: An expensive but very accurate assault rifle used by the temple militia of the Hel cult.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_WolfSTGext_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Assault rifle "Frateris" (ext. mag.)
ThingDef.description: An expensive but very accurate assault rifle used by the temple militia of the Hel cult.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_PyroWolfSTG_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Assault rifle "Ignis"
ThingDef.description: An expensive but very accurate assault rifle used by the temple militia of the Hel cult. The Ignis modification has an attached tank that contains a mixture of napalm and chemfuel. When the weapon is fired, the bullet in the barrel is wetted with the highly flammable mixture. The use of these weapons is considered cruel and inhumane.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_PyroWolfSTGext_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Assault rifle "Ignis" (ext. mag.)
ThingDef.description: An expensive but very accurate assault rifle used by the temple militia of the Hel cult. The Ignis modification has an attached tank that contains a mixture of napalm and chemfuel. When the weapon is fired, the bullet in the barrel is wetted with the highly flammable mixture. The use of these weapons is considered cruel and inhumane.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_STAfifty_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona StA50 "Visari"
ThingDef.description: The Visari is a cheap, easy-to-make hybrid of a submachine gun and an assault rifle.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
